name: nft-ticketing-client
description: AI-Verified NFT Ticketing System using QIE Blockchain SDK and QIEDEX Token Creator

_comment.qie-sdk: QIE Blockchain SDK is implemented in src/lib/qie-sdk.ts. All blockchain operations use QIE SDK patterns. ethers.js is used by QIE SDK for QIE network interactions.
_comment.qiedex: NFT contracts must be deployed using QIEDEX Token Creator. See QIEDEX_TOKEN_CREATOR_GUIDE.md for deployment instructions.
